author: Simon Kent
title: Just Go: Petition Demanding Resignation of WHO Chief Closes on 1M Signatures
description: An online petition calling both for the resignation of World Health Organization (WHO) Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus and the inclusion of Taiwan in the globalist body was nearing one million signatures Sunday morning.
content:
An online petition calling both for the resignation of World Health Organization (WHO) Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus and the inclusion of Taiwan in the globalist body was nearing one million signatures Sunday morning.
The campaign began on Janu… [+3579 chars]
